comments: Apart from the first terms, the same as A035100. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 02 2008]
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,2000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); n=0; t=1/log(2); forprime (p=2, prime(2000), write("b061716.txt", n++, " ", ceil(t*log(p))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 26 2009]
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 20 2001
extensions: OFFSET changed from 0,2 to 1,2 by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 26 2009
